meanings.definition: A digital image of the contents of a computer or mobile device screen.
meanings.sent1: I took a screenshot of my high score in the game.
meanings.sent2: She showed me a screenshot of her new wallpaper.
meanings.sent3: The screenshot of the funny text made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: The screenshot captured the moment perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The screenshot displayed all the information clearly.

meanings.definition: To capture a screenshot of a computer or mobile device screen.
meanings.sent1: Can you screenshot this webpage for me?
meanings.sent3: I will screenshot the recipe so I don't forget it.
meanings.sent4: She managed to screenshot the error message quickly.
meanings.sent5: Remember to screenshot the confirmation page after payment.
